Resource.Name: English
Resource.MSG_FORMAT_DRIVE_ASK: Are you sure that you want to format Drive %c:\\?\nAll Data will be lost.
Resource.MSG_INVALID_SELECTION: Invalid selection. Please select at least one file to copy.
Resource.MSG_ABOUT_TO_COPY: You are about to copy %s File(s) and %s Folder(s) totaling %s %s
Resource.MSG_COPYING: Copying selected files...\n\nPlease DO NOT turn your xbox off.
Resource.MSG_COPY_ERROR: An error occured while copying file(s).\nError Code: %d
Resource.MSG_COPY_INVALID: Source and Destination can not be the same.\nPlease select another destination.
Resource.MSG_COPY_CHECK:
Preparing to copy files...

Please DO NOT turn your xbox off.

Checking...
Resource.MSG_NO_DESTINATION: Destination is not available.\nPlease select another destination.
Resource.MSG_ABOUT_TO_MOVE: You are about to move %s File(s) and %s Folder(s) totaling %s %s
Resource.MSG_MOVING: Moving selected files...\n\nPlease DO NOT turn your xbox off.
Resource.MSG_MOVE_ERROR: An error occured while moving file(s).\nError Code: %d
Resource.MSG_MOVE_CHECK:
Preparing to move files...

Please DO NOT turn your xbox off.

Checking...
Resource.MSG_ABOUT_TO_DELETE: You are about to delete %s File(s) and %s Folder(s) totaling %s %s
Resource.MSG_DELETING: Deleting selected files...\n\nPlease DO NOT turn your xbox off.
Resource.MSG_DELETE_ERROR: An error occured while deleting file(s).\nError Code: %d
Resource.MSG_DELETE_CHECK:
Preparing to delete files...

Please DO NOT turn your xbox off.

Checking...
Resource.MSG_ZIPPING: Compressing selected files...\n\nPlease DO NOT turn your xbox off.
Resource.MSG_ZIP_ERROR: An error occured while compressing file(s).\nError Code: %d
Resource.MSG_ZIP_CHECK:
Checking files to add...

Please DO NOT turn your xbox off.

Checking...
Resource.MSG_CALC_SPACE: Disk space used by %s File(s) in %s Folder(s): %s %s
Resource.MSG_CALC_CHECK:
Calculating files...

Please DO NOT turn your xbox off.

Checking...
Resource.MSG_DVD_COPYING: Copying DVD Disc...\n\nPlease DO NOT turn your xbox off.
Resource.MSG_XBEPATCH_SOURCE_ERR: Only XBE file found on Harddisk can be patch.
Resource.MSG_XBEPATCH_ERROR: Unable to patch XBE file. It may have already been patched or does not require patching.
Resource.MSG_RENAME_ERROR: An error occured while renaming %s to %s.\nError Code: %d
Resource.MSG_CREATEFOLDER_ERROR: An error occured while creating new folder.\nError Code: %d
Resource.MSG_GAMESAVES_DELETE_ERROR: An error occured while trying to delete '%s'.\nError Code: %d
Resource.MSG_GAMESAVES_CONTENT: You can not copy XBL content from this module.\nPlease use the File manager to copy the content of:\n'%s'
Resource.MSG_GAMESAVES_NO_DEST: Destination full or does not exists.
Resource.MSG_GAMESSAVES_BAD_DEST: Not enough space on destination drive.
Resource.MSG_GAMESAVES_DELETE:
You are about to delete the following game saves:
%s
No. of Blocks: %u
Containing %u saves and %u contents

Resource.MSG_GAMESAVES_DELETE_ITEM:
You are about to delete the following game saves:
%s
No. of Blocks: %u
Are you sure you want to continue?
Resource.MSG_GAMESAVES_COPY_ERROR: An error occured while copying '%s'.\nError Code: %d
Resource.GAMESAVES_INVALID_FORMAT: Downloaded file is not in the correct format.
Resource.MSG_HTTP_FETCH_ERROR: Unable to retrieve file: HTTP STATUS %d
Resource.MSG_INVALID_FILE_FORMAT: The file '%s' is not a valid %s file.
Resource.MSG_MENU_BATCH_ERROR: Batch process failed.\nThe last item was: %s.\nAction: %s
Resource.MSG_MENU_DELETE_GAME: The following title will be deleted from your hard disk?\nXbox Title:\t%s\nAre you sure you want to continue?
Resource.MSG_TEXTEDITOR_SAVE_ERROR: An error occured while saving %s.\nError Code: %d
Resource.MSG_TEXTEDITOR_OPEN_ERROR: An error occured while trying to open '%s'.\nError Code: %d
Resource.MSG_TEXTEDITOR_SAVE_ASK: You have made changes to your document.\nDo you want to save the changes?
Resource.MSG_INVALID_PASSWORD: The password you entered is incorrect!
Resource.MSG_MAX_INVALID_PASSWORD: You have reached the maximum number of tries allowed to enter a valid password.\nYour Xbox will now shutdown.
Resource.MSG_INVALID_PASSCODE: The passcode you entered is incorrect!
Resource.MSG_MAX_INVALID_PASSCODE: You have reached the maximum number of tries allowed to enter a valid passcode.\nYour Xbox will now shutdown.
Resource.MSG_DASHUPDATE_SUCCESS:
You have successfully upgraded your dashboard.
Old version has been renamed to:
	"%s".
Press OK to reboot.
Resource.MSG_DASHUPDATE_FAILED: Live Update Failed.\nPress OK to reboot.
Resource.MSG_DASHUPDATE_CHECK: Validating update.\nPlease DO NOT turn off your xbox.
Resource.MSG_DASHUPDATE_VALID: Update is validated.\nPress OK to proceed with the upgrade.
Resource.MSG_BAD_CONFIGFILE: Your Config file is either corrupt or damaged.\nPlease fix this config.xml to avoid this problem.\nYou can safely ignore this warning and reboot to apply your settings.
Resource.MSG_BAD_SKINFILE: The current skin you are using caused UnleashX to lock on startup.\nPlease fix this skin to avoid this problem.\nYou can safely ignore this message and reboot to apply your current skin.
Resource.MSG_NEWHARDDISK:
UnleashX has detected a new Harddisk.
Do you want to format your new drive?

Press both Triggers and Start Button to Continue...
Resource.MSG_NEWHD_WARNING:
WARNING!!!
ALL DATA ON NON-REMOVABLE DISK WILL BE LOST.

Press both Triggers and Start Button to Continue...
Resource.MSG_NEWHD_FINISHED: UnleashX has finished preparing your new drive.\n\nPress both Triggers and Start Button to Continue...
Resource.MSG_SETTING_SAVE_ERROR: Unable to Save settings. Error Code: %d
Resource.MSG_SETTING_FAILED: Unable to set Music Volume. Error Code: %d
Resource.MSG_SETTING_RESTART: You need to restart your xbox for the settings to take effect.
Resource.MSG_SETTING_NOCONFIG: Critical Error. Unable to load Configuration from XML file.
Resource.MSG_ASK_SAVE:
Your settings has changed.
If you exit, your changes will be lost.

Do you want to save the changes?
